Text: Looks like you might have uploaded the wrong files on accident.  I downloaded this and checked the Ver.lua file.  It says it's version 5473 and not 5488.
Ver.lua isn't updated but this has several updated files, maybe it was Zygor's mistake

That file should be updated, however I considered the possiblity it was not.  So I still installed it and checked.  In-game version number is still 4.0.5473 and none of the new content is in the guides.

Are u gonna get 405488 or does anyone know of a working one? Would appreciate it!
